about_the_game:
The Mega Mic Pack includes:

Plushy Cat Paw Hammer:
The following items have been added:
- Cat Paw Hammer
- Variety Mic Blueprint 01

Avenger's Spear:
The following items have been added:
- Avenger
- Variety Mic Blueprint 02

Flying Fists:
The following items will be added:
- Overdrive
- Variety Mic Blueprint 03

Mega Rifle:
The following items will be added:
- Luftgrandza
- Variety Mic Blueprint 04

Angel Wing:
The following items have been added:
- Angel Wing
- Variety Mic Blueprint 05

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad 2.4GHz or comparable
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 or comparable
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3 GHz or comparable
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 or comparable
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 9 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows compatible sound card

short_description: The Mega Mic Pack includes: Plushy Cat Paw Hammer, Avenger's Spear, Flying Fists, Mega Rifle, Angel Wing
